Texts.Eng: Without ^orange;Extraction Devices^reset;, progression in FU will be ardurous. These wonderful devices ^green;take resource stacks and convert them into useful resources^reset;. Try it by placing ^orange;50 dirt inside^reset; a ^orange;Hand Mill^reset; from a ^green;Machining Table^reset;. Be patient. They're slow.

Texts.Chs: 你可以把食物、种子、肉类还有许多乱七八糟的东西放进萃取设备中，你永远都想不到到底会有什么玩意儿冒出来！并且我还要提醒你，如果你可以制造^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，那么萃取块的速度将会大幅提高。
Texts.Eng: You can also place food, seeds, meats and numerous other goods into extractors. ^green;Try everything you can^reset;. You never know what you'll discover! And before you whine about it: upgrade to an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; and you'll extract ^green;much^reset; faster.
